verbs.description: [ARG1: It] [V: 's] [ARG2: President Donald Trump 's first state visit : a glitzy three - day stay in D.C. for charismatic French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife , Brigitte Macron . See photos] .
It 's President Donald Trump 's first state visit : a glitzy three - day stay in D.C. for charismatic French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife , Brigitte Macron . [V: See] [ARG1: photos] .
